subject: fix(web): manual scroll position management for pagination
body:
The maintainVisibleContentPosition prop doesn't work on web platforms,
causing auto-scroll issues when loading older messages. This commit adds
web-specific scroll position tracking and restoration.

Changes:
- Track scroll offset and content height on web platforms
- Calculate height difference after pagination
- Restore scroll position manually for web
- Native platforms continue using maintainVisibleContentPosition

This fixes the auto-scrolling behavior when loading older messages
on mobile web and desktop web platforms.
title: manual scroll position management for pagination
